commentary:
1) Her heart overflows with endless love & affection towards all the yogis (ascetics), the spiritual aspirants (sadhakas) and the devotees who are walking on Her path.

2) ‘Mahat + ratih’ means that the tattva (principle) called ‘Mahat’ is very dear and joyful to Her.‘Mahat’ is the first of the great principles (tattvas) behind this creation. This entire physical manifestation arises out of this Mahat.
